revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Of the canal of the Apollophanes . . . 250 schoinia are in need of work. Of these there have been reported for the fourfold operation up to Pharmouthi, starting from the Great River, 10 schoinia west of . . .; in addition to these, for the threefold operation 20 schoinia on the north, and for the twofold operation 30 schoinia on the north, making 160 schoinia for the single operation, and the remaining 190 schoinia for the single operation. Calculated for distribution, these come to 350 schoinia for the single operation.;Of these, assigned to the account of Athychis 19 1/2 1/3 schoinia; Senyris 6 1/2 schoinia; Sinkepha 31 schoinia; Sadalou epoikion 13 schoinia; Mermertha 85 1/6 schoinia; Monimou 51 schoinia; Kerkemounis 20 schoinia; Mouchinaxap 2 1/2 schoinia; Kerkethyris 24 1/2 schoinia; Seryphis 20 schoinia; Pela 54 1/2 schoinia; Lenon 4 schoinia; Paeimis 10 schoinia; Senekeleu 8 schoinia. These come to the number given above."

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC, ZPE 24, 133-7, 1977, Pl Ic -- SB XIV 12108 (and p. 534) -- BL VIII, 378; BL IX, 278 (bibliography); BL X, 212 (bibliography); BL XI, 216
